The online report contains a video which: the lead actor of the TV show "Ang Probinsyano," being arrested by the Philippine Drug Enforcement Agency (PDEA).
The TV show: Ang Probinsyano" has been criticized by the Philippine National Police (PNP) for its portrayal of police officers, with the police chief being depicted as a villain.
The PNP issued a memorandum ordering pol: 4. The spokesman of PDEA confirmed that Coco Martin has not been arrested for any drug-related offense.
